comment.author: 36522380@N00
comment._content: The church looks so majestic without any buildings blocking its view. I didn't even realise how big it really is.

comment.author: 76652633@N00
comment._content: Wow, i'd love to see horse and carts try and get through the traffic nowadays!

comment.author: 63186071@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Historic Sydney, and we'd love to have this and all the other pictures in your Sydney City set added to the group!

comment.author: 63385174@N06
comment._content: St Andrews Cathedral was planned in the Christian Church tradition where the main door faces west (towards Kent Street), not as sometimes told, because they thought Kent Street would be the main city street over George Street.

comment.author: 79583367@N02
comment._content: I'm surprised nobody has commented on that decorative struture along the George Street kerb.  What is it?
